mapper.select:
SELECT AUTHORITY_CD, AUTHORITY_NM, IS_USE, NOTE FROM BM_AUTHORITY
AND AUTHORITY_CD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT}, '%')
AND AUTHORITY_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND IS_USE = #{IS_USE}
ORDER BY AUTHORITY_CD

SELECT C.AUTHORITY_CD, A.EMP_CD, A.EMP_NM, A.ORG_CD, B.ORG_NM, A.ASSIGNED_TASK FROM HM_MEMBER_BASIC A, HM_ORGAN_BASIC B, HM_MEMBER_AUTHORITY C WHERE A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD AND A.EMP_CD = C.EMP_CD AND C.AUTHORITY_CD = #{AUTHORITY_CD} ORDER BY EMP_CD

SELECT A.EMP_CD, A.EMP_NM, A.ORG_CD, B.ORG_NM, A.ASSIGNED_TASK FROM HM_MEMBER_BASIC A, HM_ORGAN_BASIC B WHERE A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD AND A.EMP_CD NOT IN (SELECT A.EMP_CD FROM HM_MEMBER_BASIC A, HM_ORGAN_BASIC B, HM_MEMBER_AUTHORITY C WHERE A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD AND A.EMP_CD = C.EMP_CD AND C.AUTHORITY_CD = #{AUTHORITY_CD})
AND A.EMP_CD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND A.EMP_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY A.EMP_CD
SELECT AUTHORITY_NM, AUTHORITY_CD FROM BM_AUTHORITY ORDER BY AUTHORITY_CD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BM_AUTHORITY(AUTHORITY_CD, AUTHORITY_NM, IS_USE, NOTE ) VALUES (#{AUTHORITY_CD}, #{AUTHORITY_NM}, #{IS_USE}, #{NOTE} )
